directions: Fill a food-safe silicon-based round ice mold will orange juice; freeze until solid, 2 to 3 hours.
Carefully open the ice mold and place the orange juice ball into a martini glass; add vodka.
ingredients: 1/4 cup orange juice, or as desired
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers vodka, or to taste
title: Deconstructed Screwdriver (The Raw Egg)
